cells.data:
-- dropLength :: [a] -> [b] -> [b]
on dropLength(xs, ys)
    script go
        on |位|(x, y)
            if 0 < length of x then
                if 0 < length of y then
                    |位|(tail(x), tail(y))
                else
                    {}
                end if
            else
                y
            end if
        end |位|
    end script
    go's |位|(xs, ys)
end dropLength
